don't you love how I come up with subject lines which attracts
everyone's attention? LOL!

Okay...at this link
http://www.suzutoo.co.jp/hn200405_top.html
are pics from Hino
now...I ~think~ the woman is the same woman I've seen in books and
other Japanese sites who is a descendent (?) of Hijikata...the
pictures are of the ceremony acknowledging the anniversary of
Hijikata's passing.

My question is...why is there a pic of those cute chickens?  I
mean...the even it for Hijikata I'm pretty sure (I've seen the exact
same pics on pages the fish has translated)...and now there are
these...chickens.
There are newspaper articles which you can click to enlarge and read.
